sense.gloss: it's been a long time, long time no see

sdata.j: ↑大変↑↓たいへん↓|お↑久↑↓ひさ↓しぶり|です。
sdata.e: It's been ages since I saw you last.

sdata.j: お↑元気↑↓げんき↓ですか。|お↑久↑↓ひさ↓しぶり|ですね。
sdata.e: How are you doing? I haven't seen you for an age!
I haven't seen you for a long time.
It's been a while since we last met.
I haven't seen you in a long time.
I haven't seen you for a while.
I haven't seen you for ages.
Wow! It's been a long time.
It's been a while, hasn't it?

sdata.j: こんにちは。|お↑久↑↓ひさ↓しぶり|です。
こんにちは。トムさんですよね？ |お↑久↑↓ひさ↓しぶり|です。
sdata.e: Hi. You're Tom, right? It's been a while.

sdata.j: 「|お↑久↑↓ひさ↓しぶり|って↑感↑↓かん↓じね。↑元気↑↓げんき↓にしてる？」「してる。してる。↑最近↑↓さいきん↓、↑忙↑↓いそが↓しくてさ、なかなか↑時間↑↓じかん↓がとれないのよ。↑今↑↓いま↓ね、↑病院↑↓びょういん↓の↑待合室↑↓まちあいしつ↓。↑時間↑↓じかん↓が↑少↑↓すこ↓しできたからメッセージ↑書↑↓か↓いてみたの」
sdata.e: Feels like I haven't seen you in forever. You doing good? "Yeah, I'm good. I've been so busy lately I haven't had much time to spare. Right now I'm at a hospital in the waiting room, and I had a bit of time so I thought I'd shoot you a message."

sdata.j: 「あ、↑田中↑↓たなか↓さん！」「あっ......！」「↑元気↑↓げんき↓だった？」「うん。えっと、あっ......！↑名前↑↓なまえ↓ど↑忘↑↓わす↓れしちゃった。ごめんなさい。↑名前↑↓なまえ↓なんて↑言↑↓い↓うんだったけ？」「もぉ、↑国貞↑↓くにさだ↓よ。↑国貞↑↓くにさだ↓↑恵子↑↓けいこ↓」「そうそう、↑国貞↑↓くにさだ↓さん。|お↑久↑↓ひさ↓しぶり|！」
sdata.e: Oh, Tanaka-san! "Uh...!" "Have you been doing well?" "Yeah. Um, uh...! Oh my god, I'm so sorry, but your name is slipping my mind. What's your name again?" "Really? Come on. I'm Kunisada. Keiko Kunisada." "Oh, right, Kunisada-san. It's been a while!"

sdata.j: ↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓に|お↑久↑↓ひさ↓しぶり|です。
↑本当↑↓ほんとう↓に|お↑久↑↓ひさ↓しぶり|です。
sdata.e: It really has been a long time since we've seen each other.
